*Annual LoL Meeting 2015*

{{champion:122}} : Ok guys. We need more skins. Any ideas?

{{champion:1}}: Get me a skin!

{{champion:99}}: Oh, I want a skin too!

{{champion:83}}: Just give me and {{champion:154}}  a skin already.

{{champion:122}}  *stares at*{{champion:83}} 

*Three seconds later*

You can see {{champion:83}}  falling out the window.
{{champion:3}}: I could use a New skin....
Zac skin logic. Paint him purple
MAKE A LAVA ZAC OR RAINBOw JELLO ZAC LOL

You got Debonair not all that long ago
Zac has been waiting years man...
Poor Yorick. Requests like that only get you skinned alive.
"Almost-Pyramid-Head Tryndamere"
Definitely Not Pyramid Head?
I hope theres more nightmare versions of champions in the future {{champion:17}} except Teemo, he's already scarey enough as is
If Axeman and Pyramidhead had a love child
he is wearing a {{item:3089}} and fighting his own kind, {{champion:17}}
Looks a lot more like "Lost Sinner" than even remotely like Pyramid Head.
What makes this skin the creepiest is that he has no nipples.
they serve no purpose so he removed them for aerodynamics while spinning.
This comment caught me completely off-guard.
"Oooooh!! He said he had no nipples!!!!!"

> Don’t bother looking for his weak point, Nightmare Tryndamere only deals massive damage.

This means two things.

1. This is not a historical Japanese battle.
2. Tryndamere is not a giant enemy crab.
Ekko is from Transistor, this "thing" is from Silent Hill. Can we get some originality guys.
I dunno if you realized but most of the skins in the game are references.

THEY'RE USING IDEAS FROM OTHER GAMES THAT THEIR FANS HAVE ENJOYED? The injustice! How dare they, and speaking of that, HOW DARE ALL MODERN DAY CAR COMPANIES USE CIRCULAR WHEELS. I MEAN, THEY WORK GREAT, AND EVERYONE LIKES THEM** (kind of like something else we were talking about)**, BUT HOW DARE THEY STEAL THAT IDEA. LET'S BOYCOTT RIOT AND MODERN-DAY CAR COMPANIES AND DEMAND THAT THEY REMOVE ALL THESE GREAT, FUNCTIONING IDEAS SO THAT WE CAN ALL FEEL LIKE SPESHUL SNOWFLAKES.
I can't seem to stop picturing him walking into walls and towers with his impaired vision

{{champion:23}}  ...can't *bump* ...see *bump*
{{champion:64}}  I gotcha, man. As soon as I find you, I'm gonna take off that blindfold...
I'm glad I'm not the only one who was amused with that sort of line of thinking.

{{champion:201}} Where is Trynd the game will start soon.

{{champion:29}} I don't know, but one thing I do know is we're not have Shyvana sub for him again. Nearly reached her throat before she turned back into a human.

{{champion:23}} Hey guys.

{{champion:29}} Ah a demon! (shoots crossbow)

{{champion:23}} Owhfauh! What the heck Twitch you shot me in the knee.

{{champion:29}} Sorry man I really nervous. You see I almost got eaten last game we had.

{{champion:23}} Well it's fine I mean I got hurt there yesterday so-

{{champion:201}} What happened yesterday?

{{champion:23}} I'll tell you. It was a dark snowy night. 

Flash Back (with music)

{{champion:23}} I was looking to get the old sparks flying with Ashe again. So I logically dressed up like a demon to scare her into my arms like any other normal person would.

So Tryndamere waited in a small closet in a random hallway and wait for Ashe for 7 hours when finally she appeared. 

{{champion:22}} La la la walking down this random hallway and saying what I'm doing.

{{champion:23}} (bursting threw closet door) Boo I'm a demon!

{{champion:22}} Awh!

Back to the present time (with music)

{{champion:23}} The plan was going great until she pulled out her bow.

{{champion:29}} So she shot you in the knee too.

{{champion:23}} No, she shot me in the shoulder which caused me to hit myself with my sword putting me on ice for our game and also put me on the couch for 5 weeks.

{{champion:201}} You know there's a lesson here. Can you guess?

{{champion:23}}Is it to make sure your wife isn't armed before romancing her.

{{champion:29}} Is it avoiding dressing up like a rejected pyramid head.

{{champion:201}} No, it's that you should never marry an archer.
I used to be a champion once. Then I took an arrow to the knee. Guess that makes me Swain.
